TEXT: A shikigami's shikigami. NL A bakeneko who can take human or cat form.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. They smell like vampires. Vampires are no good. NL NL As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
